TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RelativeSource extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class RelativeSource Inherits MarkupExtension Implements ISupportInitialize
type RelativeSource = class inherit MarkupExtension interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 实现一个标记扩展，该扩展描述相对于绑定目标位置的绑定源位置。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定绑定源的一种方法是使用 属性。One of the ways to specify a binding source is to use the property. 这是该属性的属性类型。This is the property type of that property. 同时为标记扩展实现和数据对象。 is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object. 当扩展返回自身 (参阅 ) 时，数据中包含相关信息。When the extension returns itself (see ), the relevant information is contained in the data. 标记扩展的主要目的是允许特性形式的可变参数构造函数语法，以便 可以使用其他模式不需要的上级类型和级别的两个额外参数以内联方式定义模式。The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form, so that the mode can be defined inline with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require. 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 信息，请参阅 [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个创建的、 用于报告验证错误消息的样式触发器。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message. 使用 属性，setter 的值将绑定到当前 使用样式) (的错误内容。Using the property, the value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style). 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：实现绑定验证](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation)。For more information on this example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation). [!code-xaml[BindValidation#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml#5)] 下面的示例演示 一个名为的自定义控件的定义 `NumericUpDown` 。The following example shows the definition of a custom control called `NumericUpDown`. 的属性绑定到作为的对象的，这是 `Value` `TemplatedParent` `NumericUpDown` 在这种情况下应用此的控件。The property of the is bound to the `Value` of the object that is the `TemplatedParent`, which is the `NumericUpDown` control that this is applied to in this case. [!code-xaml[CustomControlNumericUpDown#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/CustomControlLibrary/themes/generic.xaml#relativesource)] 有关完整示例，请参阅 [NumericUpDown 自定义控件和主题和 UI 自动化支持示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。For the complete sample, see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025). 下面的 从绑定的目标元素开始，返回上个路径中遇到的第二个。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#relativesource)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#RelativeSource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#relativesource)]

summary.span: 用初始模式以及其他用于查找所需相对源的树遍历限定符初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an initial mode and additional tree-walking qualifiers for finding the desired relative source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ancestorType``ancestorLevel`如果给出了除以外的参数，则和没有关联 `mode` 。`ancestorType` and `ancestorLevel` have no relevance if given as parameters for a `mode` other than . 不要将此签名用于其他 值。Do not use this signature for the other values. ## Examples 下面的 从绑定的目标元素开始，返回上个路径中遇到的第二个。The following returns the second encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding. summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值描述相对于绑定目标的位置的绑定源的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在初始化后为只读。This property is read-only after initialization. 如果未显式设置此属性，则设置 或， 并且 属性将隐式锁定此属性值 。If this property is not set explicitly, setting the or the and the properties will implicitly lock this property value to . ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 信息，请参阅 [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension).

exception.span: 此属性在初始化后不可变。

span.span: This property is immutable after initialization.

exception.span: 不更改此实例上的 ，而是创建新 或使用其他静态实例。

span.span: Instead of changing the on this instance, create a new or use a different static instance.

summary.span: 获取一个静态值，该值用于返回为 模式构造的 。

span.span: Gets a static value that is used to return a constructed for the mode.
A static .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这四个 值（、 或） 可生成 完全静态的，不包含任何唯一的私有值。Three of the four values, , , or , can produce a that is wholly static, containing no unique private values. 静态属性的所有使用都可以共享同一个对象，从而无需为每个用途分配单独的对象。All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use. 因此，使用静态属性可减少内存使用量。Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 信息，请参阅 [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension).

summary.span: 返回一个应设置为此标记扩展的目标对象属性上的值的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set as the value on the target object's property for this markup extension.

summary.span: 对于 ，这是另一个 ，它使用指定模式的适当的源。

span.span: For , this is another , using the appropriate source for the specified mode.
Another .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时为标记扩展实现和数据对象。 is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object. 当扩展返回时，相关信息将包含在数据中。When the extension returns itself, the relevant information is contained in the data. 标记扩展的主要目的是允许特性形式的可变参数构造函数语法 ，以便可以以内联方式定义模式，对于其他模式不需要的上级类型和级别，还可以使用两个额外的参数。The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form so that the mode can be defined inline, with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.

Setter 的值使用 属性) 的样式绑定到当前 (的错误内容 。The value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style) using the property. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：实现绑定验证](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation) 。See [How to: Implement Binding Validation](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation) for more information on this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks `ShouldSerialize`提供此方法是因为 属性没有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已更改为其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果要开发的设计器 或开发自己的包含的控件，通常需要调用此方法 。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .
